binding.activityTitle: Here is a statement about the impact of ethnic identity (perhaps you have heard some version of this about someone you know): “Joe has a fiery temper because he is from Italian stock.” As we’ve seen, sociologists would not agree with that statement. How would you try to convince someone that it is not really a good way of understanding Joe’s “fiery temper”?
